item.title: My Journey in Rust Part I
item.description: Introduction If you have been in a cave for the last year, you might not notice there’s a language that’s been rising and gathering power, it’s name is Rust. If I had to describe it in one phrase, I’d totally agree with it’s brief but true description shown in the official page: A language empowering everyone to build reliable and efficient software. Why is it so popular lately? Rust was the most loved language for the last six years, by stackoverflow survey, but why ?
